venue.address_1: George Sherman Union, Boston University, Boston, MA 02215
venue.name: George Sherman Union, Boston University, Boston, MA 02215

item.description:
In lieu of a Meetup for July, come visit us at WordCamp Boston!  This is not a registration!  This is to remind you to sign up as ticket sales will be ending soon!

WordCamp Boston 2011 will be held July 23rd and 24th at the George Sherman Union at Boston University.

WordCamp is a conference that focuses on everything WordPress. WordCamps are informal, community-organized events that are put together by WordPress users like you. Everyone from casual users to core developers participate, share ideas, and get to know each other. WordCamps are open to WordPress.com and WordPress.org users alike.

Tickets are $40 for this awesome 2 day event and you can purchase them here:  http://2011.boston.wordcamp.org/tickets/

For a list of speakers/topics, you can find them here:  http://2011.boston.wordcamp.org/schedule/

 

For any beginner who wants to catch up and enjoy the camp, we are also hosting a Beginner's Workshop on the 22nd of July from 1pm to 5pm at the School of Management at Boston University.  Tickets and details can be found here:  http://bwpmshop2.eventbrite.com/

We hope to see you all there!

Kurt and James
item.how_to_find_us: Ask us or a volunteer day of!
item.name: WordCamp Boston
